DOC.brief_title: Multi-component HIV Intervention Packages Chinese Men Who Have Sex With Men —Test , Link Care ( TLC )
DOC.criteria: • Men sex another man last 12 month base selfreporting ( sex define oral , anal , mutual masturbation ) ( include transgendered woman ) （including transgendered women） ; Aged 18 year old ; Living and/or work defined district municipal Beijing ; Able willing adequately grant informed consent . For purpose activity participant must consent questionnaire survey , receipt phone message , serological testing ; Having previously participate HIV test study . Besides criterion , additional criterion HIV Linkage Care pilot Research Clinical Trial : Men identify HIV positive test campaign Phase I study ; No plan leave Beijing next 12 month . Willing comply study procedure . Having cell phone willing receive study relate SMS text Having previously find HIV positive base selfreporting eligibility screening ; Serious psychological disturbance cognitive impairment interfere participant 's ability comply study visit schedule procedure , judge local study clinician ; Any medical psychiatric condition , opinion investigator , would make participation study unsafe , otherwise interfere substantially study objective interpretation .
